name: Enhancement Spell
description: Can be applied to any monster. Converts the move at Slot 1 into Legacy Emerge for the whole battle.

zh.name: 强化术
zh.description: 对任意血脉的精灵使用, 使用后技能栏第一个技能被替换为【血脉显现】技能, 保持全场。

name: Sun Healing
description: Can be applied to Grass (or Grass legacy type) monsters, recovering 50% of max HP.

zh.name: 光合治愈
zh.description: 对草系或者草血脉的精灵使用, 恢复精灵50%生命。

name: Flare Burst
description: Can be applied to Fire (or Fire legacy type) monsters. The move's power is increased by 150% this turn.

zh.name: 闪焰爆发
zh.description: 对火系或者火血脉的精灵使用, 本回合技能威力提升150%。

name: Flow Spell
description: Can be applied to Water (or Water legacy type) monsters. Moves do not consume energy this turn.

zh.name: 节流术
zh.description: 对水系或者水血脉的精灵使用, 本回合技能不扣除能耗。

name: Evolution Power
description: Can be used only on monsters with Leader legacy type, allowing them to evolve into a Leader form.

zh.name: 进化之力
zh.description: 对首领血脉的精灵使用, 可以使该精灵在本场战斗中进化, 部分精灵会激活远古血脉。
